definition: being one more than three, a playing card or domino or die whose upward face shows four pips
details:
adjective
- being one more than three
= synonyms: iv
noun
- a playing card or domino or die whose upward face shows four pips
= synonyms: four-spot
- the cardinal number that is the sum of three and one
= synonyms: quaternary, quartet, foursome, tetrad
